parameters.name: column_id
parameters.description: The column to which you want to apply this action
parameters.label: Column

parameters.name: row_id
parameters.description: The row to which you want to apply this action
parameters.label: Row

parameters.name: scope

parameters.label: Scope

parameters.label: Filter

parameters.name: YEAR
parameters.description: Extract year from date (24/08/2015 -> 2015)
parameters.label: Year

parameters.name: MONTH
parameters.description: Extract month of year from date (24/08/2015 -> 8)
parameters.label: Month of year

parameters.name: DAY
parameters.description: Extract day of month from date (24/08/2015 -> 24)
parameters.label: Day of month

parameters.name: HOUR_12
parameters.description: Extract the hour of the day (from an AM/PM format), from 0 to 11
parameters.label: Hour of am-pm

parameters.name: AM_PM
parameters.description: Extract the AM/PM information of the day, from 0 (AM) to 1 (PM)
parameters.label: The am-pm of the day

parameters.name: HOUR_24
parameters.description: Extract the hour of the day, from 0 to 23
parameters.label: Hour of the day

parameters.name: MINUTE
parameters.description: Extract minute from hour
parameters.label: Minute

parameters.name: SECOND
parameters.description: Extract second from minute
parameters.label: Second

parameters.name: DAY_OF_WEEK
parameters.description: Extract the day of week, (1, 2, ... , 7)
parameters.label: Day of the week

parameters.name: DAY_OF_YEAR
parameters.description: Extract the day of year. This has values from 1 to 365 in standard years and 1 to 366 in leap years
parameters.label: Day of the year

parameters.name: WEEK_OF_YEAR
parameters.description: Extract the week number of the year
parameters.label: Week of the year

description: Create columns with year, month, day, hour, minute, second, etc...
label: Extract date parts

label: Fill empty cells with text
